scripts.finddebug: ! grep Debug -H -n *.js controllers/*.js helpers/*.js models/*.js routes/*.js test/*.*js
scripts.findfixme: ! grep FIXME -H -n *.js controllers/*.js helpers/*.js models/*.js routes/*.js test/*.*js
scripts.findID: ! grep ID -H -n *.js controllers/*.js helpers/*.js models/*.js routes/*.js test/*.*js
scripts.findcrud: ! grep "Debug\|FIXME\|[[:alnum:]]ID" -H -n *.js controllers/*.js helpers/*.js models/*.js routes/*.js test/*.*js openapi.yaml
scripts.precommit: npm audit && npm run lint && npm run findcrud
